label: Description
value:
Recto:  Vertical full-length view of a bearded soldier, in cap and uniform, facing left and blowing a bugle with his right hand, while holding a sword in his left hand. Beside this study to the right is another three-quarter length view of solider, slightly larger in scale and turned to right.  

Verso:  Horizontal scene of an army camp with campfire and three soldiers in foreground; wagon train, wagons and mules in background.

label: Physical description
value: Recto: Graphite on cream paper Verso: Grapite, brush and gray wash on cream paper

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.

value: Vertical view of a young man leaning against the rigging of a sailboat.

General McClellan's Sixth Cavalry Regiment, Embarking at Alexandria for Old Point Comfort

label: Description
value: Horizontal view filled with figures of lancers on horseback in left foreground, left and extreme right middlegrounds, with a bugler and two officers at right, as a large house and animals stand in central background and as a river, containing a steamer and a sailing ship, gives way to the far shore in right background.

value:

value: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
An Infantry Column on the March

label: Description
value: View of an infantry column marching, with a few soldiers' figures drawn distinctly; trees and tree stumps shown in middle ground; small company of soldiers mounted on horses at rear.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
Two Women Seated on a Sea Wall, Cullercoats, England

label: Description
value: Horizontal view of two women, knitting a sock, while sitting on a stone wall; boats in the background, some are drawn over the underlying figure of a woman.

value: Graphite, charcoal on cream wove paper

value: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.

label: Description
value:
Recto: Horizontal view of the heads and hats of five men with rifles looking over earthworks, whose grass covering is suggested by short vertical pen strokes; a steamer is visible in left background.

Verso: sketch of an arm and a headless, fantastically clad woman with various written notations like: Mother / Father / Please send me / One tube white, Large [underlined]  / one do.

value: Pen and brown ink on light-brown wove paper
